Most important environment problem

Source: R/gss_vars_527.R
enprbus.Rd

enprbus

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question D. Here is a list of some different environmental problems. Which problem, if any, do you think is the most important for America as a whole?

Values

  • [1] air pollution

  • [2] chemicals and pesticides

  • [3] water shortage

  • [4] water pollution

  • [5] nuclear waste

  • [6] domestic waste disposal

  • [7] climate change

  • [8] genetically modified foods

  • [9] using up our natural resources

  • [10] none of these

  • [NA(d)] can't choose [NA(i)] iap [NA(j)] I don't have a job [NA(m)] dk, na, iap [NA(n)] no answer [NA(p)] not imputable [NA(r)] refused [NA(s)] skipped on web [NA(u)] uncodeable [NA(x)] not available in this release [NA(y)] not available in this year [NA(z)] see codebook

Question Years and Ballots

ballotsyears
